attributes.action: Instigate an immediate arms embargo against Israel.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Foreign Secretary David Miliband commented on reports that UK supplied equipment may have been used by the Israeli Defence Forces during the Gaza conflict in a written ministerial statement to Parliament on Tuesday 21 April. 
This was a follow up to a very passionate debate in Parliament in January where many memebers of the House expressed disapproval of the ferocity of Israel's attach on Gaza.
A number of members called for an arms embargo against Israel.
This petition is to call for an arms emabrgo against Israel to ensure that Palestinain citizens are no longet killed with the assistance of British equipment or services.
